# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the action classifier shown in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Describing an action classifier

- **description**: A text representation of the action classifier.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the action classifier that’s suitable for output during debugging.
